job.title: Software Engineer - Robotics
job.description: AION Robotics is a manufacturer of rugged autonomous tools serving Energy, Oil/Gas, Agriculture and Security industries. <br><br>We're seeking vehicle side Robotics Engineers excited to break free from simulations and get to work on real world deployed robotics systems! <br><br>Experienced in: <br>ROS<br>Perception/Point Clouds<br>Sensor Fusion<br>AWS <br>C++<br>Websockets<br>Javascript<br>Python <br>Linux<br>Real-time networking <br><br>Plus:<br>Java <br>Android Development <br>
